title: Sample Book, 1894
description: Small paper-bound book with eighteen pages stamped on both sides in color with occasional gilt or silver detail, with designs for painted and dyed cottons of type pasted in folding sample book 1905-14-1 (Indian and Japanese export designs). The designs are known as "sarasa" in Japan. Short title and number in Japanese characters on outside of one cover; Japanese inscription with stamped red seal, framed in vertical rectangle inside the cover.
